to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Changing Festival's default voice
body:
>>>>> "H" == hermann   writes:

    H> Hi, I've installed additional voices for Festival. How can I set
    H> the default voice? Starting the Festival interface and typing
    H> "help" gives no hints on that.

Hello,

festival has very good documentation, festival-doc package in debian. If
you want set a default voice put this line in you festival config file:

(set! voice_default 'voice_czech_ph)

or your preferedvoice of course.

Best

--
